content: keep your toosies toasty warm with these footies they are a quick and easy one skein project perfect as a stash buster or a gift the pattern is written to fit us size 8 to 10 shoe size these footies are easily customizable to customize just knit to the length of your or your recipient s foot the pattern provides instruction on where to do this these slippers are meant to be knitted at a somewhat dense gauge and with a finished measurement that is slightly smaller than actual foot size a snug fit is best
